application.doc: Retrieving details for the configured Luna Safenet network HSM devices

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve details for the configured safenet devices.
method.doc: To retrieve the details for all safenet Hardware Security Module (HSM) network devices using the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the SSL Certificates resource URI, providing the available safenet query string parameter.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: safenetDeviceJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: id
param.doc: The key database id used by Verify Identity Access.

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of the database. Always set as "safenet"

param.name: hsm.admin_user
param.doc: Account used to connect to the Luna SafeNet device.

param.name: hsm.type
param.doc: The HSM type of the database.

param.name: pkcs11.library
param.doc: The HSM library for the database.

param.name: pkcs11.tokenlabel
param.doc: The tokenl label of the HSM device.

param.name: hsm.ip
param.doc: The IP address of the HSM device.

param.name: hsm.client-ip
param.doc: The hostname that was used to create the certificate transfered to the Luna SA device.

param.name: hsm.serialnumber
param.doc: The serial number of the HSM partition.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
